definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="JsonObject" id="mainjsonobject">mainjsonobject</variable><variable type="File" id="lurker">lurker</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">mod_load</field><next><block type="variables_set_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:lurker</field><value name="VAL"><block type="file_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:lurker</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">midnightlurkerconfig.json</field></block></value><value name="location"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="get_game_directory"></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/config/</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="file_exists"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:lurker</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="create_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:lurker</field><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:mainjsonobject</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">lurker_chase_music</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:mainjsonobject</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">lurker_spawn_rate</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:mainjsonobject</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">the spawn rate can range from 1 to 5, with 1 being the lowest and 5 being the highest.</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:mainjsonobject</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">pop_up_jumpscare</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:mainjsonobject</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">jumpscare_sound</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:mainjsonobject</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">longer_lurker_chase</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:mainjsonobject</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">spooky_ambience</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:mainjsonobject</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">multi_spawning</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:mainjsonobject</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">insanity_progress_effect</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:mainjsonobject</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">insanity_countdown_time</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:mainjsonobject</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">the insanity countdown time determines how long the timer is for insanity. 1 is 5mins, 2 is 10mins, 3 is 20mins, and 4 is 30mins.</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="write_json"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="JOBJVAR">local:mainjsonobject</field><field name="VAR">local:lurker</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
